description:
This is not a browser. Instead it is just a skin that sits on top of the Duck-Duck-Go browser and pre-configures it for slightly faster operation.
After a few minutes it clears the screen and goes catatonic.
Rebooting reveals that it leaves several files with no access link. During boot time these have to be restored from the journal.

THIS IS BROKEN SOFTWARE!

I like the UX/UI direction the team is taking. Minimalism balance is on point is also in the functionality department, so don't confuse minimalism with Including results for asceticism

Wish more VIM like navigation for pages was there

This is indeed a very fast browser. If you do not need a large number of plugins, then this browser is just what 
you need. Nice interface, IMHO. Users should always have an additionial browser, in the event the primary fails.
Yeap ! thx develop ! easy fast browser
